title: fix: simplify balance API to return single balance field
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: The account balance API has been streamlined to return a single unified balance field instead of separate breakdowns.
gist.impact: Developers will experience a simpler API response that handles API key budgets more intuitively.
gist.visual_concept: The concept of unification and simplification. The pollinations.ai Bee is acting as a friendly accountant, merging two separate small piles of pixel coins (representing tier and pack balances) into one single, tidy, glowing stack. This represents the API returning a single 'balance' field.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee merging two small stacks of gold pixel coins into one single, glowing pile on a wooden desk. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'BALANCE'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
